plot: Blendin returns to face off with Dipper and Mabel in a futuristic battle that could trap them forever in time jail.

Dipper and Mabel find out that it's Soos's Birthday, so they throw him a surprise party. But when they bring him to the party, they find out that Soos hates his birthday! Desperate to give Soos a happy birthday, they try taking him to play laser tag. But an unexpected guest arrives.....It's Blendin! He's come back to seek his revenge against the twins in the life-or-death time battle: Globnar.—allihartz
